tool_description: Tracks application metrics and candidate responses across multiple job posting platforms in real-time.

posting_urls.description: URLs of job postings to track

tracking_duration_days.description: Number of days to track metrics (1-365)

metrics_to_track.description: Metrics to track: views, applications, saves, shares, clicks

report_frequency.description: How often to generate reports: hourly, daily, weekly

error_messages: Invalid posting URLs: One or more URLs are not accessible or do not contain job postings.
Invalid tracking duration: Duration must be between 1 and 365 days.
Invalid metrics: Metrics must be from [views, applications, saves, shares, clicks].
Invalid report frequency: Must be one of [hourly, daily, weekly].
URL limit exceeded: Maximum 20 posting URLs can be tracked simultaneously.
usage: Provide job posting URLs and specify tracking duration. Choose which metrics to monitor and how frequently to report. The tool will continuously monitor and provide performance data.

total_views.description: Total number of views across all postings

platform_breakdown.description: Performance metrics broken down by platform

conversion_rate.description: Application to view conversion rate percentage
